title: Little Miss Sunshine
description: Little Miss Sunshine visits Miseryland where smiling and laughing is forbidden!They're back! Rediscover the zaniest characters you've ever met in this best-selling series which has sold millions worldwide. Just in time for Fall 1997's hot new animated TV show, "Mr. Men" and "Little Miss" are being relaunched in the U. S. Bright and charming, with easily recognizable characters and a small take-along format, "Mr. Men" and "Little Miss" books are easy enough for young readers, witty enough for humor-prone adults, and highly collectible for one and all.
author: Roger Hargreaves
